---
title: "Embed via iframe"
format: html
---

This method requires that the shiny app is deployed on a server. The app is embedded in an iframe, which is a separate HTML document that is embedded within the current document.

```{=html}
 <iframe id="example1" src="https://gallery.shinyapps.io/goog-trend-index/" style="border: none; width: 100%; height: 720px" frameborder="0"></iframe>
```
